helpcenter-description: Find answers, guides, and ways to contact support

helpcenter-faq.question: How do I create a post?
helpcenter-faq.answer: To get started, create a post in the Workspace, select the AI tools you want, and connect your social networks. You can also check the Getting Started section.

helpcenter-faq.question: How do I connect social networks?
helpcenter-faq.answer: Go to Profile â†’ Connections and click Connect on the desired network. Some platforms may require OAuth authorization.

helpcenter-faq.question: What data do you store?
helpcenter-faq.answer: We store only the minimum necessary information and follow security standards. See our Privacy Policy for details.

helpcenter-faq.question: Why can't I create a post?
helpcenter-faq.answer: Make sure the video tool (e.g., Sora) is selected and you have enough credits or quota. Also, check for network restrictions and server logs.

helpcenter-faq.question: Can I cancel a post that has already been sent?
helpcenter-faq.answer: If the post is already sent, cancellation depends on the platform API (e.g., YouTube). You can check the post status in the app and delete it manually if needed.
